About

Hi there, I’m Ryan Walder. I’m a Linux systems administrator currently working for Path Intelligence, I have always had a passion for technology and solving big, meaty problems. I’m a proponent of DevOps methodologies and the benefits they can bring to businesses (as well as making my nights quieter!), I am a big proponent of Open Source software and am active within the Open Source community.

Setup

Some fun facts about the setup of this project include:

  • Built using Jekyll
  • Uses the Hyde theme
  • Developed on GitHub and hosted for free on GitHub Pages
  • Written in NeoVim, a modern fork of Vim.

Thanks for reading!
